channel.title: starwars on …soul, as in software?
channel.description: Recent content in starwars on …soul, as in software?

item.title: fork explained Star Wars style, in Perl
item.description: use Force qw(-midiclorians -jarjar); my $vader = fork; noooooo() unless $vader; # I am your father sub noooooo { hang_there_for_a_while(); exit; # to the Millenium Falcon }
